text:
The following code doesn't work as expected:

<html>
<body>
<!--#set var="test_var" value="b"-->
<!--#if expr="v('test_var') == 'a'" -->
*if*
<!--#elif expr="v('test_var') == 'b'" -->
*elif*     
<!--#else -->
*else*     
<!--#endif -->
</body>    
</html>    

I've got

[an error occurred while processing this directive] *else*

and error message

Invalid expression "v('test_var') == 'b'"

in error.log instead of

*elif*
creator: home+apache@vvv.kiev.ua

text: Fix accepted and backported.  Will be in httpd-2.4.5+
creator: Tom.Donovan@acm.org
